title: Items
summary: There is huge variety of items in Starscape. See the pages below to learn what those items are and more!
full_text:
Items
There is huge variety of items in Starscape. See the pages below to learn what those items are and more!
Armor
Armor to protect your player from ground PvP*.
Blueprints
Ships & Turrets. 
Clothing
Clothing to customize your appearance in the game. 
Components
Perhaps more in the future, used in crafting.
Cosmetics
Cosmetics for your ship.
Deployables
Fireworks, Mines and, Disruptors.
Furniture
Furniture to liven up your apartment. 
Modules
Weapon Rigs, Defense Rigs, Engine Rigs, Reactor Rigs and Subsystems.
Resources
Ores and Minerals.
Salvage
Faction Rep items, Cargo and Junk.
Turrets
For ships.
Weapons
Weapons to arm your player for ground PvP*.
*Ground PvP is being used to describe the usage, for any point when your player is not in a ship and on foot engaged with PvP.
